description: Clarity table for bundleable charge diagnosis.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the charge line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DX_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Diagnosis qualifier of this charge.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
